user_instruction: 'Compose an email to Lisa at MarketHub (lisa@markethub.com) asking about potential discounts. You can check out MyDealFinder for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["lisa@markethub.com"],"subject":"Inquiry Regarding Potential Discounts","body":"Hi Lisa,

I hope you’re doing well.

I’m interested in MarketHub’s offerings and recently came across references on MyDealFinder suggesting there might be promotional pricing or discount opportunities available. Could you please let me know if any current discounts, introductory offers, or bulk purchase incentives are available?

I’d appreciate any details you can share, including eligibility requirements or timeframes, so I can plan accordingly.

Thank you for your time, and I look forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,
[Your Name]"}

formatted_items.content: Email sent to Lisa at MarketHub asking about available discounts and any related details.

final_output: Email sent to Lisa at MarketHub asking about available discounts and any related details.
